#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int d,n,value,range,count,i;
	vector<int>v;
	while(1)
	{
		count = 0;
		v.clear();
		cin >> d >> n;
		if((d == n) && d<=1 && n<=1)
		{
			//cout << "Hi" << endl;
			if(n == 1)
				cout << "1" << endl;
			else if(n == 0)
				cout << "0" << endl;
			
			break;
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin >> value;
			v.push_back(value);
		}		
		
		sort(v.begin(), v.end());

		i = 0;
		while(i<n)
		{
			//cout << "hi" << endl;
			range = v[i] + d;
			while((i<n) && (v[i] <= range))
			{
				i++;
			}
		//	cout << i << " " << v[i-1] << " ";
			range = v[i-1] + d;
		//	cout << range << "  " << d << "  ";
			while((i<n) && (v[i] <= range))
			{
				i++;
			}
			count++;
		//	cout << count << "   " << i << endl; 
		}
		//cout << endl;
		cout << count << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
